core_mechanics.core_roll: 2d6 + Attribute + 1d4 (if Trained in a relevant skill)

tiers.name: Full Success
tiers.effect: You achieve your goal perfectly and may gain an additional advantage.

tiers.name: Success with a Cost
tiers.effect: You achieve your goal, but with a complication, a tough choice, or a lesser effect.

tiers.name: Miss
tiers.effect: The situation escalates, a new danger appears, or you face a difficult consequence.

attributes.name: Force
attributes.description: Represents a character's power, strength, and directness. Used for overcoming obstacles with brute strength, intimidation, and powerful displays of ability.

attributes.name: Finesse
attributes.description: Represents a character's agility, precision, and subtlety. Used for stealth, delicate tasks, and hitting a precise weakness.

attributes.name: Wits
attributes.description: Represents a character's knowledge, perception, and cunning. Used for noticing details, recalling lore, and devising clever plans.

attributes.name: Heart
attributes.description: Represents a character's willpower, empathy, and social grace. Used for resisting fear, connecting with others, and inspiring action.

skills.description: Skills represent a character's specific training. If an action falls under a skill a character is Trained in, they add 1d4 to their core roll.

skills.name: Wreck
skills.description: Break things, create openings, cause chaos.

skills.name: Intimidate
skills.description: Coerce or threaten someone through sheer presence.

skills.name: Maneuver
skills.description: Perform feats of acrobatics, climbing, and agile movement.

skills.name: Tinker
skills.description: Disable traps, pick locks, and repair equipment.

skills.name: Investigate
skills.description: Search a scene for clues and spot hidden details.

skills.name: Know
skills.description: Recall lore, understand magic, and know history.

skills.name: Survey
skills.description: Navigate the wilderness and track creatures.

skills.name: Sense
skills.description: Read a person's emotions and detect lies.

skills.name: Tend
skills.description: Administer first aid and care for the sick or wounded.

harm.name: Harm
harm.description: Represents physical and mental stress. Each character has a Harm Track with a certain capacity (e.g., 6 boxes). When a character takes harm, they mark off boxes. When the track is full, they are taken out of the scene. Certain moves or consequences may also apply penalties based on how much Harm is marked.

uses: Activate a powerful Draconic Aspect or a companion's ultimate move.
Introduce a minor, helpful fact into the story.

character_creation.guidelines: Character creation in the Legacy System is about defining who the character is and what they are good at.
steps: 1. Choose a Playbook (e.g., The Dragon Heir for Rya, The Vengeful Spirit for Garrick).
2. Assign Attribute scores. Start with this array and assign one to each of the four attributes: +2, +1, +0, -1.
3. Choose a number of 'Trained' skills as defined by the character's Playbook (typically 3).
4. Note any starting 'Moves' or special abilities from the Playbook.

experience_points.description: Characters gain Experience Points (XP) by taking risks, learning from their failures, and engaging with the world. At the end of each session, answer these questions:
xp_questions: Did you learn something new and important?
Did you overcome a significant obstacle?
Did you express your character's beliefs or background in a meaningful way?

level_up_mechanics.description: When a character has marked 5 XP, they erase their marks and Level Up.
advancement_options: Increase one Attribute by +1 (to a maximum of +3).
Choose a new 'Move' from your character's Playbook.

bond_level_system.description: Bonds are forged through actions, unlocking benefits at each level.
earning_bp: Completing a companion's personal quest (+3 BP)
A key dialogue choice deepens your relationship (+1 BP)
Successfully 'Aiding' a companion on a critical roll (+1 BP)

levels.title: Trusted Friend
levels.benefit: Unlock a unique passive Bond Synergy move.

levels.title: Confidant
levels.benefit: Unlock the ability to use Draconic Unity.
